nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.a3.maze.Mob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GrumpyGary, PassivePerry, SneakySnek

    public abstract class Mob
extends java.lang.Object
    Mob are NPCs in the game that move and interact without any input from the user. Functionally, they act as a spider that latches onto a Tile and scale the board. Although the Constructor takes a Board, the board is not modified at all.

      • setBoard

        public void setBoard(Board board)
        Sets the board for the mob. Handled by the MobManager. Not all mobs needs this, can't be done at creation.
        Parameters:
        board - to set.

      • setMobName

        public void setMobName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the mob. Handled by concrete sub-class.
        Parameters:
        name - to set.

      • setImageUrl

        public void setImageUrl(java.lang.String newImageUrl)
        Sets the imageURL to the one specified.
        Parameters:
        newImageUrl - new filename of mob image.

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)
        Sets the active state of the mob. Will not change if mob has no host.
        Parameters:
        active - state of mob.

      • getActive

        public boolean getActive()
        Gets the active state of the mob.
        Returns:
        boolean active state of mob.

      • advanceByTick

        public void advanceByTick()
        Moves the Mob by one Cell. Default implementation, this can be override for advanced behaviour.

      • occupyHost

        public void occupyHost(Tile target)
        Occupies a new tile as a host.
        Parameters:
        target - cell to occupy.

      • leaveHost

        public void leaveHost()
        Calls occupy host with null as the target.

      • getNextSeed

        public int getNextSeed()
        Gets next seed based off indexes. Seed indexes automatically increment.
        Returns:
        next pseudo-random number. [0-9].
